details: As a 4th-year Computer Science student, I am working on a thesis in Data Science & Machine Learning applications. I have published 2 research papers in IEEE international conferences, including work on autism detection using enhanced MobileNetV1 and plant disease detection using deep learning models. I have also served as the Class Representative (CR) and have additional research papers under review at international venues. Additionally, I have participated in tech events, showcasing software projects, and contributed to research discussions as a member of the Research Club.
